__e: Ever since you were a boy... you've sacrificed everything for me, all for one dream.
You sacrificed so much for my education, so I know it's selfish to say this, but I want to work in Tokyo and be with you.
I have never had anyone sacrifice for me or my family like you did.
Who says that you get to decide what's right and what's wrong... and who gets sacrificed for the greater good and who doesn't?
How can you do this to me, after everything that I've done for this family, after everything that I've sacrificed for her?

I've been trying to think of what I could possibly say to you after all that you've sacrificed for this country, what you've done for me in the past, and, of course, what you've done for my brother David.
- Sirs, you should take a look at this. - Another vessel? Too small.
Life is too filthy, My Dad is too good, too honest, That's why he gave up on his life,
So you decided to do this wonderful job all by yourself, while your father sacrificed his life for his family.
- Sirs, you should take a look at this. - Another vessel? Too small.
Life is too filthy, My Dad is too good, too honest, That's why he gave up on his life,
So you decided to do this wonderful job all by yourself, while your father sacrificed his life for his family.
When I try to, I see those who have passed away due to my foolishness.
Then why did he hide it? Isn't that information what thousands of Survey Corps soldiers died for?
I haven't seen him since he sacrificed the dignity of his position on live television.
I know this kind of happiness will never come again
I have sacrificed my blood, my freedom and my life for you, and not because I wanted the Lexicon or the throne of Athens, but because I wanted your love in return.
I put in my time, I sacrificed my marriage for this job because I'm good at it.
I didn't sacrifice my whole life for him to lose him now.
Answer me, didn't I put my life and my honor and everything on the line to save your ass?
You were like my brother, I'd do anything for you..
I didn't sacrifice my whole life for him to lose him now.
Answer me, didn't I put my life and my honor and everything on the line to save your ass?
You were like my brother, I'd do anything for you..
You're ignoring the sacrifice they made for their country.
But now, so many people sacrificed their lives that it has become real.
And I kept on thinking about you over there... and all the boys who've died... who've sacrificed their bodies and their minds.
